name: Idle Champions: Aasimar Glitch Donaar Skin & Feat Pack
summary: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Donaar (if you don't already own them) Aasimar Glitch Donaar Skin An Epic Feat for Donaar 7 Gold Donaar Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts
